Hi,

I have received a Eclipse project from my officemate, including junit
=
test classes. I have created a project in my Linux Eclipse and copied
every=
thing into it. Now, no errors.

But when I run all the junit test within th=
is project, Eclipse says
that "No tests found with test runner 'JUnit 3'". =
From the manual of
this project, the author was using JUnit Version 3.81.

=
I do not know inside out of junit. I just use it. If it works, it
works. Bu=
t now, I got the problem. Could you help me out? Thank you
very much.
